document.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA TAXICAB COMMISSION AJUDICATORY AUTHORITY TEMPORARY AMENDMENT ACT OF 1989

history.narrative: Law 8-59 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-351. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 11, 1989 and September 26, 1989, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 13, 1989, it was assigned Act No. 8-89 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
